item.title: Need help with Dev7 Banking
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok I need help I added a bank (2213) in to client.java it showed up BUT it does not let you bank. So I searched in client.java for 2213 and found this.

if (objectID == 2213) { // Bank Booth if (duelFight == true) { sendMessage("Sorry you cant open your bank in duel!"); } else { /*skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; NpcWanneTalk = 2;*/ openUpBank(); } }

Could someone please type 2213 in there client.java because this bank has something to do with duel im not sure anyway could someone post correct code or help me out?

Read full topic
